title: [Complete] Scheduled Maintenance - Patch 5.8 - 30/04/2015
body:
Summoners,

On 30/04/2015, starting at 02:30 AM AEST, ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 5.8. At 04:00 AM AEST, the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded.

We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 3 hours.

The approximate size of this patch is 344mb.

-Mindstar

replies.body: When I update it, it always said that log issue and still 32%.... Why and how to solve?
Anybody else having my problem? when i patched it, it got stuck on 99%?

Does anyone know if the server's back up?
I'm playing on na and didn't wanna repatch to then find it's still down.
Ty
Why not check the server status page? You know it is there for exactly that, right?
